Plot: The extremely talented Santiago Munez is given a chance at professional football, after being spotted by a scout who has ties with Newcastle United.
Title: Goal! The Dream Begins
Writer: Mike Jefferies (story), Adrian Butchart (screenplay), Dick Clement (screenplay), Ian La Frenais (screenplay), Mike Jefferies (screenplay)
Actors: Leonardo Guerra, Tony Plana, Miriam Colon, Kuno Becker
